Included Studies
```{r}
slices <- c(7, 4, 23, 10, 17)
lbls <- c("Review/Conflict Description", "Review/Tool Evaluation", "Empirical Study/Conflict Description", "Empirical Study/Tool", "Gray Literature")
pie(slices, labels = lbls, main="Included Papers", col=c("steelblue2", "steelblue", "darkolivegreen3", "darkolivegreen4", "darkgrey"))
```
Cattle
```{r}
## Bobcats do not predate cattle
slices <- c(2, 1)
lbls <- c("Rancher Survey", "Camera Trap Observations")
pie(slices, col=c("steelblue2", "darkgoldenrod1"))
```
Sheep/Goat
```{r}
## Bobcats predate sheep/goats
slices <- c(10, 2, 2)
pie(slices, col=c("darkolivegreen3", "steelblue2", "darkgoldenrod1"))

## Bobcats do not predate sheep/goats
slices <- c(2, 1, 1)
pie(slices, col=c("steelblue2", "darkolivegreen3", "darkgoldenrod1"))
```

Poultry
```{r}
## Bobcats predate poultry
slices <- c(2, 2, 1)
pie(slices, col=c("steelblue2", "darkgoldenrod1", "darkolivegreen3"))

## Bobcats do not predate poultry
slices <- c(1)
pie(slices, col=c("steelblue2"))
```


Creating a Stacked Bar Graph
```{r}
bobcat.paper.types <- read.csv("bobcat.paper.types.csv")


ggplot(data=bobcat.paper.types, aes(x=Predate, y=Paper, fill=Type)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity")
  ggsave(file = "testy.png")
```
